description:
#### New package name: **[adobereader](https://chocolatey.org/packages/adobereader)**

---

`adobereader-update` has been deprecated because functionality to install updates has now been built directly into the `adobereader` package.

This package exists only for backward compatibility to provide a transitional dummy package for existing users and scripts which may still use this package ID.
summary: View, print, sign, and annotate PDF files
author: Adobe
